message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and we're willing to start the negotiation at $100. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to pay more. We're happy to meet you halfway and propose a price of $102.50 for the product. Let us know if this works for you!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $98 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. Considering your interest, we're willing to offer the product at $100. This is our final offer, as we value your business but also need to maintain our pricing strategy. Please let us know if this works for you!
